1.0.name: wordpress/feedbackforms-integrator-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
Plugin Overview:

This plug-in will assist in the implementation of FeedbackForms on your Wordpress site. Simply insert the JavaScript given by FeedbackForms to enable the feedback form. In order to create the feedback form you will need to register on FeedbackForms.com.

FeedbackForms:

FeedbackForms is a sophisticated feedback analytics service allowing you to understand what users are doing on your site or blog and why. After registering on FeedbackForms.com, simply create your sleek feedback form, implement it, all in under five minutes. Visitors will then click on the attractive button on your site in order to leave feedback. Within FeedbackForms extensive analytics of the feedback will be at your hands.
